ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] singing steel bp, for real this time
ygData.msgSnippet: It s a self-only heal.  Either 80 or 100hp ... From: jay schultze To: eqbards@egroups.com Sent: Saturday, June 17, 2000 4:37 PM Subject: Re: [eqbards] singing
ygData.messageBody:
It's a self-only heal. Either 80 or 100hp
----- Original Message -----
From: jay schultze
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Sent: Saturday, June 17, 2000 4:37 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] singing steel bp, for real this time


Not sure, I think it's stamina regen (lame), someone from FoH mentioned a
100hp heal. I'll ask them tonight after work.

I was in the zone on their first 4 (or so) attempts at Trak. They got pretty
closed to killing him, but various problems kept victory at bay. I'm pretty
sure everyone on my server except maybe Celestial Tomb (laf) was pulling for
them on this kill. I think it's pretty awesome that they finally did it, and
I think it's pretty funny that every time it seems every time they take out
a big guy that a Bard piece drops. I'm hoping they kill The Sarnak Queen in
Chardok soon and Crip gets his arms. =P

Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
54th semi-retired Bard (where is my Diablo2!?), Veeshan

>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
>To: "'eqbards@egroups.com'" <eqbards@egroups.com>
>Subject: [eqbards] singing steel bp, for real this time
>Date: Sat, 17 Jun 2000 14:28:03 -0400
>
>FoH killed trak, and got a bard BP AC40 STR10 DEX10 CHA10 AGI10 but does
>anyone know what Effect: Invigorate does? i know invigor is stamina regen,
>but not sure what invigorate is.
>
>Shada Powa, L55 Wood Elf Troubador
>Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
